sentences.en: Listen to the voice of illuminati.
So let me tell you what the Illuminati are doing these days.
sentences.cn: 所以让我告诉你这些日子里光明会正在做的.

sentences.en: The Illuminati are disguised as the booth babes.
We are under attack from an old enemy. The Illuminati.
sentences.cn: 我们被过去的敌人们一直攻击, 那就是光照会.

trans.tran_cn: （自称）有睿智的人，先觉者，光照派
